comment: Duplication of ~ wl-equsal1t , with shorter proof. If one imposes a disjoint variable condition on x,y , then one can use ~ bj-alequexv and reduce axiom dependencies, and similarly for the following theorems. Note: ~ wl-equsalcom is also interesting. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
